name: MTLBinaryArchive
desc: A container for pipeline state descriptors and their associated compiled shader code.

items.name: var device: MTLDevice
items.desc: The Metal device object that created the binary archive.

items.name: var label: String?
items.desc: A string that identifies the library.

items.name: func addComputePipelineFunctions(descriptor: MTLComputePipelineDescriptor)
items.desc: Adds a description of a compute pipeline to the archive.

items.name: func addRenderPipelineFunctions(descriptor: MTLRenderPipelineDescriptor)
items.desc: Adds a description of a render pipeline to the archive.

items.name: func addTileRenderPipelineFunctions(descriptor: MTLTileRenderPipelineDescriptor)
items.desc: Adds a description of a tile renderer pipeline to the archive.

items.name: func addFunction(descriptor: MTLFunctionDescriptor, library: MTLLibrary)
items.desc: Adds a description of a function to the archive.

items.name: func serialize(to: URL)
items.desc: Writes the contents of the archive to a file.
